code: import{Button,TextField}from'@mui/material';import{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import usePostCreatePostFilter from'@/hooks/post/usePostCreatePostFilter';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PostFilterCreatePage=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{mutate}=usePostCreatePostFilter();const[filterData,setFilterData]=useState({code:'',title:'',show:false,priority:1});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD544\uD130 \uB9CC\uB4E4\uAE30"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"\uCF54\uB4DC(category)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{onChange:e=>setFilterData({...filterData,code:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"\uC81C\uBAA9(title)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{onChange:e=>setFilterData({...filterData,title:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:async()=>{await mutate(filterData);navigate(-1);},children:"\uB9CC\uB4E4\uAE30"})]});};export default PostFilterCreatePage;
